name: couturier
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person or company that designs, makes, and sells expensive fashionable clothing: In 1960 Pierre Cardin became the first couturier to design men's clothes. Yves Saint Laurent was the visionary French couturier who forever changed fashion. See
couture
More examplesFewer examplesElizabeth Emanuel is the couturier who designed Princess Diana's wedding dress. The legendary couturier Coco Chanel is still making her stylish presence felt.Bridal couturiers can help you design a gown that highlights your best features.
